## BaseSeoProps.facebook property

Used for Facebook Insights, you must add a facebook app ID to your page to for it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
facebook?: {
        appId: string;
    };
```

## Remarks


```tsx
facebook={{
  appId: 1234567890,
}}

```
